# useVirtualModel() function

React hook. Creates and stores one [VirtualScroller](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller) instance. It is not recreated during component lifecycle.

**Signature:**

```typescript
useVirtualModel: (params: VirtualScrollerInitialParams) => VirtualScroller
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

params


</td><td>

[VirtualScrollerInitialParams](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscrollerinitialparams)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns**

[VirtualScroller](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller)

## Remarks

Normally [useVirtual()](/virtual/reference/virtual-react.usevirtual) should be used.
